Detailed Description

Provide lite weight encryption/decryption interface

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN DrmSecurity::DrmCrypt (  UINT8 *  in_buf,
INT  buf_len
)  [static]
 

Encrypts/Decrypts the the given buffer. The result is stored back in the given buffer itself. The key for encryption/decryption is known to only DRM security module.

Returns:
TRUE on success

void DrmSecurity::InitializeKey (   )  [static]
 

Initialize the encryption key. This function should be called once during DRM initialization.
